org.diet4j.tomcat

Class TomcatWebAppClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • java.security.SecureClassLoader
        • java.net.URLClassLoader
          • org.apache.catalina.loader.WebappClassLoader
            • org.diet4j.tomcat.TomcatWebAppClassLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, org.apache.catalina.Lifecycle, org.apache.tomcat.InstrumentableClassLoader

    public class TomcatWebAppClassLoader
extends org.apache.catalina.loader.WebappClassLoader
    The ClassLoader for the root Module. This is different from ModuleClassLoader as Tomcat requires it to be a subclass of WebappClassLoader.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.apache.catalina.loader.WebappClassLoader

      • loadClass

        public Class loadClass(String name,
                       boolean resolve)
                throws ClassNotFoundException
        Load a Class. First we examine the local cache, then we use the default algorithm, and finally we ask our dependency ClassLoaders.
        Overrides:
        loadClass in class org.apache.catalina.loader.WebappClassLoader
        Parameters:
        name - name of the to-be-loaded class
        resolve - do we also resolve the class
        Returns:
        the loaded class
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - loading the class failed, it could not be found
